1 var Net = require('net'),
  2   EventEmitter = require('events').EventEmitter,
  3   Util = require('util'),
  4   ErrorMessages = require('./constants/ErrorMessages'),
  5   DATA_TYPES = require('./constants/DataTypes'),
  6   CASConstants = require('./constants/CASConstants'),
  7   PacketReader = require('./packets/PacketReader'),
  8   PacketWriter = require('./packets/PacketWriter'),
  9   ActionQueue = require('./utils/ActionQueue'),
 10   Helpers = require('../src/utils/Helpers'),
 11   Cache = require('../src/utils/Cache');
 12 
 13 var ClientInfoExchangePacket = require('./packets/' + '/ClientInfoExchangePacket'),
 14   OpenDatabasePacket = require('./packets/' + '/OpenDatabasePacket'),
 15   GetEngineVersionPacket = require('./packets/' + '/GetEngineVersionPacket'),
 16   ExecuteQueryPacket = require('./packets/' + '/ExecuteQueryPacket'),
 17   GetSchemaPacket = require('./packets/' + '/GetSchemaPacket.js'),
 18   CloseQueryPacket = require('./packets/' + '/CloseQueryPacket'),
 19   BatchExecuteNoQueryPacket = require('./packets/' + '/BatchExecuteNoQueryPacket'),
 20   CloseDatabasePacket = require('./packets/' + '/CloseDatabasePacket'),
 21   FetchPacket = require('./packets/' + '/FetchPacket'),
 22   SetAutoCommitModePacket = require('./packets/' + '/SetAutoCommitModePacket'),
 23   RollbackPacket = require('./packets/' + '/RollbackPacket'),
 24   CommitPacket = require('./packets/' + '/CommitPacket'),
 25   LOBReadPacket = require('./packets/' + '/LOBReadPacket');
 26 
 27 module.exports = CUBRIDConnection;
 28 
 29 //Support custom events
 30 Util.inherits(CUBRIDConnection, EventEmitter);
 31 
 32 /**
 33  * Create a new CUBRID connection instance
 34  * @param brokerServer
 35  * @param brokerPort
 36  * @param user
 37  * @param password
 38  * @param database
 39  * @param cacheTimeout
 40  * @constructor
 41  */
 42 function CUBRIDConnection(brokerServer, brokerPort, user, password, database, cacheTimeout) {
 43   // Using EventEmitter.call on an object will do the setup of instance methods / properties
 44   // (not inherited) of an EventEmitter.
 45   // It is similar in purpose to super(...) in Java or base(...) in C#, but it is not implicit in Javascript.
 46   // Because of this, we must manually call it ourselves:
 47   EventEmitter.call(this);
 48 
 49   this._queryCache = null;
 50   if (typeof cacheTimeout !== 'undefined' && cacheTimeout > 0) {
 51     this._queryCache = new Cache();
 52   }
 53 
 54   this._socket = new Net.Socket();
 55 
 56   // Connection parameters
 57   this.brokerServer = brokerServer || 'localhost';
 58   this.initialBrokerPort = brokerPort || 33000;
 59   this.connectionBrokerPort = -1;
 60   this.user = user || 'public';
 61   this.password = password || '';
 62   this.database = database || 'demodb';
 63 
 64   // Session public variables
 65   this.autoCommitMode = null; //will be initialized on connect
 66   this.sessionId = 0;
 67 
 68   // Execution semaphore variables; prevent double-connect-attempts, overlapping-queries etc.
 69   this.connectionOpened = false;
 70   this.connectionPending = false;
 71   this.queryPending = false;
 72 
 73   // Driver events
 74   this.EVENT_ERROR = 'error';
 75   this.EVENT_CONNECTED = 'connect';
 76   this.EVENT_ENGINE_VERSION_AVAILABLE = 'engine version';
 77   this.EVENT_BATCH_COMMANDS_COMPLETED = 'batch execute done';
 78   this.EVENT_QUERY_DATA_AVAILABLE = 'query data';
 79   this.EVENT_SCHEMA_DATA_AVAILABLE = 'schema data';
 80   this.EVENT_FETCH_DATA_AVAILABLE = 'fetch';
 81   this.EVENT_FETCH_NO_MORE_DATA_AVAILABLE = 'fetch done';
 82   this.EVENT_BEGIN_TRANSACTION = 'begin transaction';
 83   this.EVENT_SET_AUTOCOMMIT_MODE_COMPLETED = 'set autocommit mode';
 84   this.EVENT_COMMIT_COMPLETED = 'commit';
 85   this.EVENT_ROLLBACK_COMPLETED = 'rollback';
 86   this.EVENT_QUERY_CLOSED = 'close query';
 87   this.EVENT_CONNECTION_CLOSED = 'close';
 88   this.EVENT_LOB_READ_COMPLETED = 'lob read completed';
 89 
 90   //Auto-commit constants
 91   this.AUTOCOMMIT_ON = true;
 92   this.AUTOCOMMIT_OFF = false;
 93 
 94   //Database schema variables
 95   this.SCHEMA_TABLE = CASConstants.CUBRIDSchemaType.CCI_SCH_CLASS;
 96   this.SCHEMA_VIEW = CASConstants.CUBRIDSchemaType.CCI_SCH_VCLASS;
 97   this.SCHEMA_ATTRIBUTE = CASConstants.CUBRIDSchemaType.CCI_SCH_ATTRIBUTE;
 98 
 99   //Private variables
100   this._CASInfo = [0, 0xFF, 0xFF, 0xFF];
101   this._queriesPacketList = [];
102   this._INVALID_RESPONSE_LENGTH = -1;
103   this._PREVENT_CONCURRENT_REQUESTS = true;
104   this._LOB_MAX_IO_LENGTH = 128 * 1024;
105 
106   //Database engine version
107   this._DB_ENGINE_VER = '';
108 
109   //Uncomment the following lines if you will not always provide an 'error' listener in your consumer code,
110   //to avoid any unexpected exception. Be aware that:
111   //Error events are treated as a special case in node. If there is no listener for it,
112   //then the default action is to print a stack trace and exit the program.
113   //http://nodejs.org/api/events.html
114   //this.on('error',function(err){
115   //  Helpers.logError(err.message);
116   //  //... (add your own error-handling code)
117   //});
118 }
119 
120 /**
121  * Get broker connection port
122  * @param self
123  * @param callback
124  * @private
125  */
126 CUBRIDConnection.prototype._doGetBrokerPort = function (self, callback) {
127   self._socket = Net.createConnection(self.initialBrokerPort, self.brokerServer);
128   self._socket.setNoDelay(true);
129 
130   var packetWriter = new PacketWriter();
131   var clientInfoExchangePacket = new ClientInfoExchangePacket();
132   clientInfoExchangePacket.write(packetWriter);
133   self._socket.write(packetWriter._buffer);
134 
135   self._socket.on('error', function (err) {
136     this.connectionOpened = false;
137     delete this._queriesPacketList;
138     callback.call(err);
139   });
140 
141   self._socket.once('data', function (data) {
142     var packetReader = new PacketReader();
143     packetReader.write(data);
144     clientInfoExchangePacket.parse(packetReader);
145     var newPort = clientInfoExchangePacket.newConnectionPort;
146     self.connectionBrokerPort = newPort;
147     if (newPort > 0) {
148       self._socket.end();
149     }
150     if (callback && typeof(callback) === 'function') {
151       if (newPort < 0) {
152         callback.call(null);
153       } else {
154         var err = new Error(ErrorMessages.ERROR_NEW_BROKER_PORT);
155         callback.call(err);
156       }
157     }
158   });
159 };
160 
161 /**
162  * Login to a database
163  * @param self
164  * @param callback
165  * @private
166  */
167 CUBRIDConnection.prototype._doDatabaseLogin = function (self, callback) {
168   var err = null;
169   var responseData = new Buffer(0);
170   var expectedResponseLength = this._INVALID_RESPONSE_LENGTH;
171 
172   if (self.connectionBrokerPort > 0) {
173     self._socket = Net.createConnection(self.connectionBrokerPort, self.brokerServer);
174     self._socket.setNoDelay(true);
175   }
176 
177   var packetWriter = new PacketWriter();
178   var openDatabasePacket = new OpenDatabasePacket(
179     {
180       database : self.database,
181       user     : self.user,
182       password : self.password,
183       casInfo  : self._CASInfo
184     }
185   );
186   openDatabasePacket.write(packetWriter);
187   self._socket.write(packetWriter._buffer);
188 
189   self._socket.on('error', function (err) {
190     this.connectionOpened = false;
191     delete this._queriesPacketList;
192     callback.call(self, err);
193   });
194 
195   self._socket.on('data', function (data) {
196     responseData = Helpers._combineData(responseData, data);
197     if (expectedResponseLength === self._INVALID_RESPONSE_LENGTH &&
198       responseData.length >= DATA_TYPES.DATA_LENGTH_SIZEOF) {
199       expectedResponseLength = Helpers._getExpectedResponseLength(responseData);
200     }
201     if (responseData.length === expectedResponseLength) {
202       self._socket.removeAllListeners('data');
203       var packetReader = new PacketReader();
204       packetReader.write(responseData);
205       openDatabasePacket.parse(packetReader);
206       self._CASInfo = openDatabasePacket.casInfo;
207       var errorCode = openDatabasePacket.errorCode;
208       var errorMsg = openDatabasePacket.errorMsg;
209       if (errorCode !== 0) {
210         err = new Error(errorCode + ':' + errorMsg);
211       } else {
212         self.sessionId = openDatabasePacket.sessionId;
213         self.autoCommitMode = (self._CASInfo[3] & 0x01) ? self.AUTOCOMMIT_ON : self.AUTOCOMMIT_OFF;
214       }
215       callback.call(self, err);
216     }
217   });
218 };
219 
220 /**
221  * Get the server database engine version
222  * @param callback
223  */
224 CUBRIDConnection.prototype._getEngineVersion = function (self, callback) {
225   var err = null;
226   var responseData = new Buffer(0);
227   var expectedResponseLength = this._INVALID_RESPONSE_LENGTH;
228 
229   var packetWriter = new PacketWriter();
230   var getEngineVersionPacket = new GetEngineVersionPacket(
231     {
232       casInfo : self._CASInfo
233     }
234   );
235 
236   getEngineVersionPacket.write(packetWriter);
237   self._socket.write(packetWriter._buffer);
238 
239   self._socket.on('data', function (data) {
240     responseData = Helpers._combineData(responseData, data);
241     if (expectedResponseLength === self._INVALID_RESPONSE_LENGTH &&
242       responseData.length >= DATA_TYPES.DATA_LENGTH_SIZEOF) {
243       expectedResponseLength = Helpers._getExpectedResponseLength(responseData);
244     }
245     if (responseData.length === expectedResponseLength) {
246       self._socket.removeAllListeners('data');
247       var packetReader = new PacketReader();
248       packetReader.write(data);
249       getEngineVersionPacket.parse(packetReader);
250       var errorCode = getEngineVersionPacket.errorCode;
251       var errorMsg = getEngineVersionPacket.errorMsg;
252       if (errorCode !== 0) {
253         err = new Error(errorCode + ':' + errorMsg);
254       } else {
255         self._DB_ENGINE_VER = getEngineVersionPacket.engineVersion;
256       }
257       if (callback && typeof(callback) === 'function') {
258         callback.call(self, err);
259       }
260     }
261   });
262 };
263 
264 /**
265  * Connect to database
266  * @param callback
267  */
268 CUBRIDConnection.prototype.connect = function (callback) {
269   var self = this;
270   var err = null;
271 
272   if (self.connectionOpened === true) {
273     err = new Error(ErrorMessages.ERROR_CONNECTION_ALREADY_OPENED);
274     Helpers._emitEvent(self, err, self.EVENT_ERROR, null);
275     if (callback && typeof(callback) === 'function') {
276       callback.call(self, err);
277     }
278     return;
279   }
280 
281   if (self.connectionPending === true) {
282     err = new Error(ErrorMessages.ERROR_CONNECTION_ALREADY_PENDING);
283     Helpers._emitEvent(self, err, self.EVENT_ERROR, null);
284     if (callback && typeof(callback) === 'function') {
285       callback.call(self, err);
286     }
287     return;
288   }
289 
290   self.connectionPending = true;
291 
292   ActionQueue.enqueue(
293     [
294       function (cb) {
295         self._doGetBrokerPort(self, cb);
296       },
297 
298       function (cb) {
299         self._doDatabaseLogin(self, cb);
300       },
301 
302       function (cb) {
303         self._getEngineVersion(self, cb);
304       }
305     ],
306 
307     function (err) {
308       self.queryPending = false; //reset query execution status
309       self.connectionPending = false;
310       self.connectionOpened = !(typeof err !== 'undefined' && err !== null);
311       Helpers._emitEvent(self, err, self.EVENT_ERROR, self.EVENT_CONNECTED);
312       if (callback && typeof(callback) === 'function') {
313         callback.call(self, err);
314       }
315     }
316   );
317 };
318 
319 /**
320  * Get the server database engine version
321  * @param callback
322  */
323 CUBRIDConnection.prototype.getEngineVersion = function (callback) {
324   Helpers._emitEvent(this, null, this.EVENT_ERROR, this.EVENT_ENGINE_VERSION_AVAILABLE, this._DB_ENGINE_VER);
325   if (callback && typeof(callback) === 'function') {
326     callback.call(this, null, this._DB_ENGINE_VER);
327   }
328 };
329 
330 /**
331  * Execute SQL statements in batch mode
332  * @param sqls
333  * @param callback
334  */
335 CUBRIDConnection.prototype.batchExecuteNoQuery = function (sqls, callback) {
336   var self = this;
337   var sqlsArr = null;
338   var err = null;
339 
340   if (Array.isArray(sqls)) {
341     if (sqls.length === 0) {
342       //no commands to execute
343       Helpers._emitEvent(self, null, null, self.EVENT_BATCH_COMMANDS_COMPLETED);
344       if (callback && typeof(callback) === 'function') {
345         callback.call(self, null);
346       }
347       return;
348     }
349     sqlsArr = sqls;
350   } else {
351     sqlsArr = new Array(sqls);
352   }
353 
354   for (var i = 0; i < sqlsArr.length; i++) {
355     if (!Helpers._validateInputSQLString(sqlsArr[i])) {
356       err = new Error(ErrorMessages.ERROR_INPUT_VALIDATION);
357       Helpers._emitEvent(self, err, self.EVENT_ERROR, null);
358       if (callback && typeof(callback) === 'function') {
359         callback.call(self, err);
360       }
361       return;
362     }
363   }
364 
365   var responseData = new Buffer(0);
366   var expectedResponseLength = this._INVALID_RESPONSE_LENGTH;
367 
368   ActionQueue.enqueue(
369     [
370       function (cb) {
371         if (self.connectionOpened === false) {
372           self.connect(cb);
373         } else {
374           cb();
375         }
376       },
377 
378       function (cb) {
379         var packetWriter = new PacketWriter();
380         var batchExecuteNoQueryPacket = new BatchExecuteNoQueryPacket(
381           {
382             SQLs           : sqlsArr,
383             casInfo        : self._CASInfo,
384             autoCommitMode : self.autoCommitMode,
385             dbVersion      : self._DB_ENGINE_VER
386           }
387         );
388         batchExecuteNoQueryPacket.write(packetWriter);
389         self._socket.write(packetWriter._buffer);
390 
391         self._socket.on('data', function (data) {
392           responseData = Helpers._combineData(responseData, data);
393           if (expectedResponseLength === self._INVALID_RESPONSE_LENGTH &&
394             responseData.length >= DATA_TYPES.DATA_LENGTH_SIZEOF) {
395             expectedResponseLength = Helpers._getExpectedResponseLength(responseData);
396           }
397           if (responseData.length === expectedResponseLength) {
398             self._socket.removeAllListeners('data');
399             var packetReader = new PacketReader();
400             packetReader.write(data);
401             batchExecuteNoQueryPacket.parse(packetReader);
402             var errorCode = batchExecuteNoQueryPacket.errorCode;
403             var errorMsg = batchExecuteNoQueryPacket.errorMsg;
404             if (self._DB_ENGINE_VER.startsWith('8.4.3')) {
405               for (var i = 0; i < batchExecuteNoQueryPacket.arrResultsCode.length; i++) {
406                 if (batchExecuteNoQueryPacket.arrResultsCode[i] < 0) {
407                   if (err === null) {
408                     err = [];
409                   }
410                   err.push(new Error(batchExecuteNoQueryPacket.arrResultsCode[i] +
411                     ':' + batchExecuteNoQueryPacket.arrResultsMsg[i]));
412                 }
413               }
414             } else {
415               if (errorCode !== 0) {
416                 err = new Error(errorCode + ':' + errorMsg);
417               }
418             }
419             if (cb && typeof(cb) === 'function') {
420               cb.call(self, err);
421             }
422           }
423         });
424       }
425     ],
426 
427     function (err) {
428       Helpers._emitEvent(self, err, self.EVENT_ERROR, self.EVENT_BATCH_COMMANDS_COMPLETED);
429       if (callback && typeof(callback) === 'function') {
430         callback.call(self, err);
431       }
432     }
433   );
434 };
435 
436 /**
437  * Execute a SQL statement which does not return records
438  * @param sql
439  * @param callback
440  */
441 CUBRIDConnection.prototype.execute = function (sql, callback) {
442   var self = this;
443   var err = null;
444 
445   if (!Helpers._validateInputSQLString(sql)) {
446     err = new Error(ErrorMessages.ERROR_INPUT_VALIDATION);
447     Helpers._emitEvent(self, err, self.EVENT_ERROR, null);
448     if (callback && typeof(callback) === 'function') {
449       callback.call(self, err);
450     }
451     return null;
452   }
453 
454   var arrSQL = [];
455   arrSQL.push(sql);
456 
457   return this.batchExecuteNoQuery(arrSQL, callback);
458 };
459 
460 /**
461  * Execute sql statement with parameters
462  * @param sql
463  * @param arrParamsValues
464  * @param arrDelimiters
465  * @param callback
466  * @return {*}
467  */
468 CUBRIDConnection.prototype.executeWithParams = function (sql, arrParamsValues, arrDelimiters, callback) {
469   var formattedSQL = Helpers._sqlFormat(sql, arrParamsValues, arrDelimiters);
470   Helpers.logInfo('Formatted sql is: ' + formattedSQL);
471 
472   return this.execute(formattedSQL, callback);
473 };
474 
475 /**
476  * Execute query and retrieve rows results
477  * @param sql
478  * @param callback
479  */
480 CUBRIDConnection.prototype.query = function (sql, callback) {
481   var err = null;
482   var self = this;
483 
484   if (self.queryPending === true && self._PREVENT_CONCURRENT_REQUESTS) {
485     err = new Error(ErrorMessages.ERROR_QUERY_ALREADY_PENDING);
486     Helpers._emitEvent(self, err, self.EVENT_ERROR, null);
487     if (callback && typeof(callback) === 'function') {
488       callback.call(self, err);
489     }
490     return;
491   }
492 
493   if (!Helpers._validateInputSQLString(sql)) {
494     Helpers._emitEvent(self, new Error(ErrorMessages.ERROR_INPUT_VALIDATION), self.EVENT_ERROR, null);
495     if (callback && typeof(callback) === 'function') {
496       callback.call(self, err);
497     }
498     return;
499   }
500 
501   var responseData = new Buffer(0);
502   var expectedResponseLength = this._INVALID_RESPONSE_LENGTH;
503 
504   self.queryPending = true;
505 
506   ActionQueue.enqueue(
507     [
508       function (cb) {
509         if (self.connectionOpened === false) {
510           self.connect(cb);
511         } else {
512           cb();
513         }
514       },
515 
516       function (cb) {
517         // Check if data is already in cache
518         if (self._queryCache !== null) {
519           if (self._queryCache.contains(sql)) {
520             self.queryPending = false;
521             //query handle set to null, to prevent further fetch (cache is intended only for small data)
522             Helpers._emitEvent(self, null, null, self.EVENT_QUERY_DATA_AVAILABLE, self._queryCache.get(sql), null);
523             if (callback && typeof(callback) === 'function') {
524               callback(err, self._queryCache.get(sql), null);
525             }
526             return;
527           }
528         }
529 
530         var packetWriter = new PacketWriter();
531         var executeQueryPacket = new ExecuteQueryPacket(
532           {
533             sql            : sql,
534             casInfo        : self._CASInfo,
535             autoCommitMode : self.autoCommitMode,
536             dbVersion      : self._DB_ENGINE_VER
537           }
538         );
539         executeQueryPacket.write(packetWriter);
540         self._socket.write(packetWriter._buffer);
541 
542         self._socket.on('data', function (data) {
543           responseData = Helpers._combineData(responseData, data);
544           if (expectedResponseLength === self._INVALID_RESPONSE_LENGTH &&
545             responseData.length >= DATA_TYPES.DATA_LENGTH_SIZEOF) {
546             expectedResponseLength = Helpers._getExpectedResponseLength(responseData);
547           }
548           if (responseData.length === expectedResponseLength) {
549             self._socket.removeAllListeners('data');
550             var packetReader = new PacketReader();
551             packetReader.write(responseData);
552             var result = executeQueryPacket.parse(packetReader);
553             var errorCode = executeQueryPacket.errorCode;
554             var errorMsg = executeQueryPacket.errorMsg;
555             if (errorCode !== 0) {
556               err = new Error(errorCode + ':' + errorMsg);
557             } else {
558               self._queriesPacketList.push(executeQueryPacket);
559             }
560             if (cb && typeof(cb) === 'function') {
561               if (typeof err !== 'undefined' && err !== null) {
562                 //self.queryPending = false;
563               } else {
564                 if (self._queryCache !== null) {
565                   self._queryCache.getSet(sql, result);
566                 }
567               }
568               cb.call(self, err, result, executeQueryPacket.handle);
569             }
570           }
571         });
572       }
573     ],
574 
575     function (err, result, handle) {
576       self.queryPending = false;
577 //      if (typeof err != 'undefined' && err != null) {
578 //        self.queryPending = false;
579 //      }
580       Helpers._emitEvent(self, err, self.EVENT_ERROR, self.EVENT_QUERY_DATA_AVAILABLE, result, handle);
581       if (callback && typeof(callback) === 'function') {
582         callback.call(self, err, result, handle);
583       }
584     }
585   );
586 };
587 
588 /**
589  * Execute query with parameters
590  * @param sql
591  * @param arrParamsValues
592  * @param arrDelimiters
593  * @param callback
594  * @return {*}
595  */
596 CUBRIDConnection.prototype.queryWithParams = function (sql, arrParamsValues, arrDelimiters, callback) {
597   var formattedSQL = Helpers._sqlFormat(sql, arrParamsValues, arrDelimiters);
598   Helpers.logInfo('Formatted sql is: ' + formattedSQL);
599 
600   return this.query(formattedSQL, callback);
601 };
602 
603 /**
604  * Fetch query next rows results
605  * @param queryHandle
606  * @param callback
607  */
608 CUBRIDConnection.prototype.fetch = function (queryHandle, callback) {
609   var err = null;
610   var self = this;
611   var responseData = new Buffer(0);
612   var expectedResponseLength = this._INVALID_RESPONSE_LENGTH;
613 
614   self._socket.on('data', function (data) {
615     responseData = Helpers._combineData(responseData, data);
616     if (expectedResponseLength === self._INVALID_RESPONSE_LENGTH &&
617       responseData.length >= DATA_TYPES.DATA_LENGTH_SIZEOF) {
618       expectedResponseLength = Helpers._getExpectedResponseLength(responseData);
619     }
620     if (responseData.length === expectedResponseLength) {
621       self._socket.removeAllListeners('data');
622       var packetReader = new PacketReader();
623       packetReader.write(responseData);
624       var result = fetchPacket.parse(packetReader, self._queriesPacketList[i]);
625       var errorCode = fetchPacket.errorCode;
626       var errorMsg = fetchPacket.errorMsg;
627       if (errorCode !== 0) {
628         err = new Error(errorCode + ':' + errorMsg);
629       }
630       Helpers._emitEvent(self, err, self.EVENT_ERROR, self.EVENT_FETCH_DATA_AVAILABLE, result, queryHandle);
631       if (callback && typeof(callback) === 'function') {
632         callback.call(self, err, result, queryHandle);
633       }
634     }
635   });
636 
637   var foundQueryHandle = false;
638   for (var i = 0; i < this._queriesPacketList.length; i++) {
639     if (this._queriesPacketList[i].handle === queryHandle) {
640       foundQueryHandle = true;
641       break;
642     }
643   }
644 
645   if (!foundQueryHandle) {
646     err = new Error(ErrorMessages.ERROR_NO_ACTIVE_QUERY);
647     self._socket.removeAllListeners('data');
648     Helpers._emitEvent(self, err, self.EVENT_ERROR, null);
649     if (callback && typeof(callback) === 'function') {
650       callback.call(self, err, null, null);
651     }
652   } else {
653     if (this._queriesPacketList[i].currentTupleCount === this._queriesPacketList[i].totalTupleCount) {
654       self._socket.removeAllListeners('data');
655       Helpers._emitEvent(self, null, null, self.EVENT_FETCH_NO_MORE_DATA_AVAILABLE, queryHandle);
656       if (callback && typeof(callback) === 'function') {
657         callback.call(self, err, null, queryHandle);
658       }
659     } else {
660       var packetWriter = new PacketWriter();
661       var fetchPacket = new FetchPacket(
662         {
663           casInfo    : self._CASInfo,
664           db_version : self._DB_ENGINE_VER
665         }
666       );
667       fetchPacket.write(packetWriter, this._queriesPacketList[i]);
668       self._socket.write(packetWriter._buffer);
669     }
670   }
671 };
672 
673 /**
674  * Close query
675  * @param queryHandle
676  * @param callback
677  */
678 CUBRIDConnection.prototype.closeQuery = function (queryHandle, callback) {
679   var err = null;
680   var self = this;
681   var responseData = new Buffer(0);
682   var expectedResponseLength = this._INVALID_RESPONSE_LENGTH;
683 
684   if (!Helpers._validateInputPositive(queryHandle)) {
685     Helpers._emitEvent(self, new Error(ErrorMessages.ERROR_INPUT_VALIDATION), self.EVENT_ERROR, null);
686     if (callback && typeof(callback) === 'function') {
687       callback.call(self, err);
688     }
689     return;
690   }
691 
692   self.queryPending = false;
693 
694   var foundQueryHandle = false;
695   for (var i = 0; i < this._queriesPacketList.length; i++) {
696     if (this._queriesPacketList[i].handle === queryHandle) {
697       foundQueryHandle = true;
698       break;
699     }
700   }
701   if (!foundQueryHandle) {
702     err = new Error(ErrorMessages.ERROR_NO_ACTIVE_QUERY + ": " + queryHandle);
703     self._socket.removeAllListeners('data');
704     Helpers._emitEvent(self, err, self.EVENT_ERROR, null);
705     if (callback && typeof(callback) === 'function') {
706       callback.call(self, err, null);
707     }
708   } else {
709     var packetWriter = new PacketWriter();
710     var closeQueryPacket = new CloseQueryPacket(
711       {
712         casInfo    : self._CASInfo,
713         reqHandle  : queryHandle,
714         db_version : self._DB_ENGINE_VER
715       }
716     );
717     closeQueryPacket.write(packetWriter);
718     self._socket.write(packetWriter._buffer);
719   }
720 
721   self._socket.on('data', function (data) {
722     responseData = Helpers._combineData(responseData, data);
723     if (expectedResponseLength === self._INVALID_RESPONSE_LENGTH &&
724       responseData.length >= DATA_TYPES.DATA_LENGTH_SIZEOF) {
725       expectedResponseLength = Helpers._getExpectedResponseLength(responseData);
726     }
727     if (responseData.length === expectedResponseLength) {
728       self._socket.removeAllListeners('data');
729       var packetReader = new PacketReader();
730       packetReader.write(data);
731       closeQueryPacket.parse(packetReader);
732       var errorCode = closeQueryPacket.errorCode;
733       var errorMsg = closeQueryPacket.errorMsg;
734       if (errorCode !== 0) {
735         err = new Error(errorCode + ':' + errorMsg);
736       } else {
737         for (var i = 0; i < self._queriesPacketList.length; i++) {
738           if (self._queriesPacketList[i].handle === queryHandle) {
739             self._queriesPacketList.splice(i, 1);
740             break;
741           }
742         }
743       }
744       Helpers._emitEvent(self, err, self.EVENT_ERROR, self.EVENT_QUERY_CLOSED, queryHandle);
745       if (callback && typeof(callback) === 'function') {
746         callback.call(self, err, queryHandle);
747       }
748     }
749   });
750 };
751 
752 /**
753  * Close connection
754  * @param callback
755  */
756 CUBRIDConnection.prototype.close = function (callback) {
757   var err = null;
758   var self = this;
759   var responseData = new Buffer(0);
760   var expectedResponseLength = this._INVALID_RESPONSE_LENGTH;
761 
762   if (self.connectionOpened === false) {
763     err = new Error(ErrorMessages.ERROR_CONNECTION_ALREADY_CLOSED);
764     Helpers._emitEvent(self, err, self.EVENT_ERROR, null);
765     if (callback && typeof(callback) === 'function') {
766       callback.call(self, err);
767     }
768     return;
769   }
770 
771   //reset connection status
772   self.queryPending = false;
773   self.connectionPending = false;
774   self.connectionOpened = false;
775 
776   ActionQueue.enqueue(
777     [
778       function (cb) {
779         ActionQueue.while(
780           function () {
781             return (self._queriesPacketList[0] !== null && self._queriesPacketList[0] !== undefined);
782           },
783 
784           function (callb) {
785             self.closeQuery(self._queriesPacketList[0].handle, callb);
786           },
787 
788           function (err) {
789             //log non-blocking error
790             if (typeof err !== 'undefined' && err !== null) {
791               Helpers.logError(ErrorMessages.ERROR_ON_CLOSE_QUERY_HANDLE + err);
792             }
793             cb.call(null);
794           }
795         );
796       },
797 
798       function (cb) {
799         var packetWriter = new PacketWriter();
800         var closeDatabasePacket = new CloseDatabasePacket(
801           {
802             casInfo    : self._CASInfo,
803             db_version : self._DB_ENGINE_VER
804           }
805         );
806         closeDatabasePacket.write(packetWriter);
807         self._socket.write(packetWriter._buffer);
808 
809         self._socket.on('data', function (data) {
810           responseData = Helpers._combineData(responseData, data);
811           if (expectedResponseLength === self._INVALID_RESPONSE_LENGTH &&
812             responseData.length >= DATA_TYPES.DATA_LENGTH_SIZEOF) {
813             expectedResponseLength = Helpers._getExpectedResponseLength(responseData);
814           }
815           if (responseData.length === expectedResponseLength) {
816             self._socket.removeAllListeners('data');
817             var packetReader = new PacketReader();
818             packetReader.write(data);
819             closeDatabasePacket.parse(packetReader);
820             // Close internal socket connection
821             self._socket.destroy();
822             var errorCode = closeDatabasePacket.errorCode;
823             var errorMsg = closeDatabasePacket.errorMsg;
824             if (errorCode !== 0) {
825               err = new Error(errorCode + ':' + errorMsg);
826             }
827             if (cb && typeof(cb) === 'function') {
828               cb.call(self, err);
829             }
830           }
831         });
832       }
833     ],
834 
835     function (err) {
836       Helpers._emitEvent(self, err, self.EVENT_ERROR, self.EVENT_CONNECTION_CLOSED);
837       if (callback && typeof(callback) === 'function') {
838         callback.call(self, err);
839       }
840     }
841   );
842 };
843 
844 /**
845  * Start transaction
846  * @param callback
847  */
848 CUBRIDConnection.prototype.beginTransaction = function (callback) {
849   var self = this;
850   _toggleAutoCommitMode(self, self.AUTOCOMMIT_OFF, function (err) {
851     Helpers._emitEvent(self, err, self.EVENT_ERROR, self.EVENT_BEGIN_TRANSACTION);
852     if (callback && typeof(callback) === 'function') {
853       callback.call(self, err);
854     }
855   });
856 };
857 
858 /**
859  * Set session auto-commit mode
860  * @param autoCommitMode
861  * @param callback
862  */
863 CUBRIDConnection.prototype.setAutoCommitMode = function (autoCommitMode, callback) {
864   var self = this;
865   _toggleAutoCommitMode(self, autoCommitMode, function (err) {
866     Helpers._emitEvent(self, err, self.EVENT_ERROR, self.EVENT_SET_AUTOCOMMIT_MODE_COMPLETED);
867     if (callback && typeof(callback) === 'function') {
868       callback.call(self, err);
869     }
870   });
871 };
872 
873 /**
874  * RollbackPacket transaction
875  * @param callback
876  */
877 CUBRIDConnection.prototype.rollback = function (callback) {
878   var err = null;
879   var self = this;
880   var responseData = new Buffer(0);
881   var expectedResponseLength = this._INVALID_RESPONSE_LENGTH;
882 
883   if (self.autoCommitMode === false) {
884     var packetWriter = new PacketWriter();
885     var rollbackPacket = new RollbackPacket(
886       {
887         casInfo    : self._CASInfo,
888         db_version : self._DB_ENGINE_VER
889       }
890     );
891     rollbackPacket.write(packetWriter);
892     self._socket.write(packetWriter._buffer);
893   } else {
894     self._socket.removeAllListeners('data');
895     Helpers._emitEvent(self, err, self.EVENT_ERROR, null);
896     if (callback && typeof(callback) === 'function') {
897       callback.call(self, err);
898     }
899   }
900 
901   self._socket.on('data', function (data) {
902     responseData = Helpers._combineData(responseData, data);
903     if (expectedResponseLength === self._INVALID_RESPONSE_LENGTH &&
904       responseData.length >= DATA_TYPES.DATA_LENGTH_SIZEOF) {
905       expectedResponseLength = Helpers._getExpectedResponseLength(responseData);
906     }
907     if (responseData.length === expectedResponseLength) {
908       self._socket.removeAllListeners('data');
909       var packetReader = new PacketReader();
910       packetReader.write(data);
911       rollbackPacket.parse(packetReader);
912       var errorCode = rollbackPacket.errorCode;
913       var errorMsg = rollbackPacket.errorMsg;
914       if (errorCode !== 0) {
915         err = new Error(errorCode + ':' + errorMsg);
916       }
917       Helpers._emitEvent(self, err, self.EVENT_ERROR, self.EVENT_ROLLBACK_COMPLETED);
918       if (callback && typeof(callback) === 'function') {
919         callback.call(self, err);
920       }
921     }
922   });
923 };
924 
925 /**
926  * CommitPacket transaction
927  * @param callback
928  */
929 CUBRIDConnection.prototype.commit = function (callback) {
930   var err = null;
931   var self = this;
932   var responseData = new Buffer(0);
933   var expectedResponseLength = this._INVALID_RESPONSE_LENGTH;
934 
935   if (self.autoCommitMode === false) {
936     var packetWriter = new PacketWriter();
937     var commitPacket = new CommitPacket(
938       {
939         casInfo    : self._CASInfo,
940         db_version : self._DB_ENGINE_VER
941       }
942     );
943     commitPacket.write(packetWriter);
944     self._socket.write(packetWriter._buffer);
945   } else {
946     self._socket.removeAllListeners('data');
947     Helpers._emitEvent(self, err, self.EVENT_ERROR, null);
948     if (callback && typeof(callback) === 'function') {
949       callback.call(self, err);
950     }
951   }
952 
953   self._socket.on('data', function (data) {
954     responseData = Helpers._combineData(responseData, data);
955     if (expectedResponseLength === self._INVALID_RESPONSE_LENGTH &&
956       responseData.length >= DATA_TYPES.DATA_LENGTH_SIZEOF) {
957       expectedResponseLength = Helpers._getExpectedResponseLength(responseData);
958     }
959     if (responseData.length === expectedResponseLength) {
960       self._socket.removeAllListeners('data');
961       var packetReader = new PacketReader();
962       packetReader.write(data);
963       commitPacket.parse(packetReader);
964       var errorCode = commitPacket.errorCode;
965       var errorMsg = commitPacket.errorMsg;
966       if (errorCode !== 0) {
967         err = new Error(errorCode + ':' + errorMsg);
968       }
969       Helpers._emitEvent(self, err, self.EVENT_ERROR, self.EVENT_COMMIT_COMPLETED);
970       if (callback && typeof(callback) === 'function') {
971         callback.call(self, err);
972       }
973     }
974   });
975 };
976 
977 /**
978  * Autocommit mode helper
979  * @param self
980  * @param autoCommitMode
981  * @param callback
982  * @private
983  */
984 function _toggleAutoCommitMode(self, autoCommitMode, callback) {
985   var err = null;
986   var responseData = new Buffer(0);
987   var expectedResponseLength = self._INVALID_RESPONSE_LENGTH;
988 
989   if (!Helpers._validateInputBoolean(autoCommitMode)) {
990     Helpers._emitEvent(self, new Error(ErrorMessages.ERROR_INPUT_VALIDATION), self.EVENT_ERROR, null);
991     if (callback && typeof(callback) === 'function') {
992       callback.call(self, err);
993     }
994     return;
995   }
996 
997   if (self.autoCommitMode === autoCommitMode) {
998     if (callback && typeof(callback) === 'function') {
999       callback.call(self, err);
1000       return;
1001     }
1002   }
1003 
1004   var packetWriter = new PacketWriter();
1005   var setAutoCommitModePacket = new SetAutoCommitModePacket(
1006     {
1007       casInfo        : self._CASInfo,
1008       autoCommitMode : autoCommitMode,
1009       dbVersion      : self._DB_ENGINE_VER
1010     }
1011   );
1012   setAutoCommitModePacket.write(packetWriter);
1013   self._socket.write(packetWriter._buffer);
1014 
1015   self._socket.on('data', function (data) {
1016     responseData = Helpers._combineData(responseData, data);
1017     if (expectedResponseLength === -1 && responseData.length >= DATA_TYPES.DATA_LENGTH_SIZEOF) {
1018       expectedResponseLength = Helpers._getExpectedResponseLength(responseData);
1019     }
1020     if (responseData.length === expectedResponseLength) {
1021       self._socket.removeAllListeners('data');
1022       var packetReader = new PacketReader();
1023       packetReader.write(data);
1024       setAutoCommitModePacket.parse(packetReader);
1025       var errorCode = setAutoCommitModePacket.errorCode;
1026       var errorMsg = setAutoCommitModePacket.errorMsg;
1027       if (errorCode !== 0) {
1028         err = new Error(errorCode + ':' + errorMsg);
1029       } else {
1030         self.autoCommitMode = autoCommitMode;
1031       }
1032 
1033       if (callback && typeof(callback) === 'function') {
1034         callback.call(self, err);
1035       }
1036     }
1037   });
1038 }
1039 
1040 /**
1041  * Get databases schema information
1042  * @param schemaType
1043  * @param callback
1044  */
1045 CUBRIDConnection.prototype.getSchema = function (schemaType, callback) {
1046   var err = null;
1047   var self = this;
1048 
1049   var responseData = new Buffer(0);
1050   var expectedResponseLength = this._INVALID_RESPONSE_LENGTH;
1051 
1052   ActionQueue.enqueue(
1053     [
1054       function (cb) {
1055         if (self.connectionOpened === false) {
1056           self.connect(cb);
1057         } else {
1058           cb();
1059         }
1060       },
1061 
1062       function (cb) {
1063         var packetWriter = new PacketWriter();
1064         var getSchemaPacket = new GetSchemaPacket(
1065           {
1066             casInfo    : self._CASInfo,
1067             schemaType : schemaType,
1068             db_version : self._DB_ENGINE_VER
1069           }
1070         );
1071         getSchemaPacket.writeRequestSchema(packetWriter);
1072         self._socket.write(packetWriter._buffer);
1073 
1074         self._socket.on('data', function (data) {
1075           responseData = Helpers._combineData(responseData, data);
1076           if (expectedResponseLength === self._INVALID_RESPONSE_LENGTH &&
1077             responseData.length >= DATA_TYPES.DATA_LENGTH_SIZEOF) {
1078             expectedResponseLength = Helpers._getExpectedResponseLength(responseData);
1079           }
1080           if (responseData.length === expectedResponseLength) {
1081             self._socket.removeAllListeners('data');
1082             var packetReader = new PacketReader();
1083             packetReader.write(responseData);
1084             getSchemaPacket.parseRequestSchema(packetReader);
1085             var errorCode = getSchemaPacket.errorCode;
1086             var errorMsg = getSchemaPacket.errorMsg;
1087             if (errorCode !== 0) {
1088               err = new Error(errorCode + ':' + errorMsg);
1089             }
1090             if (cb && typeof(cb) === 'function') {
1091               cb.call(self, err, getSchemaPacket);
1092             }
1093           }
1094         });
1095       },
1096 
1097       function (getSchemaPacket, cb) {
1098         expectedResponseLength = -1;
1099         var responseData = new Buffer(0);
1100         var packetWriter = new PacketWriter();
1101         getSchemaPacket.writeFetchSchema(packetWriter);
1102         self._socket.write(packetWriter._buffer);
1103 
1104         self._socket.on('data', function (data) {
1105           responseData = Helpers._combineData(responseData, data);
1106           if (expectedResponseLength === self._INVALID_RESPONSE_LENGTH &&
1107             responseData.length >= DATA_TYPES.DATA_LENGTH_SIZEOF) {
1108             expectedResponseLength = Helpers._getExpectedResponseLength(responseData);
1109           }
1110           if (responseData.length === expectedResponseLength) {
1111             self._socket.removeAllListeners('data');
1112             var packetReader = new PacketReader();
1113             packetReader.write(responseData);
1114             var result = getSchemaPacket.parseFetchSchema(packetReader);
1115             var errorCode = getSchemaPacket.errorCode;
1116             var errorMsg = getSchemaPacket.errorMsg;
1117             if (errorCode !== 0) {
1118               err = new Error(errorCode + ':' + errorMsg);
1119             }
1120             if (cb && typeof(cb) === 'function') {
1121               cb.call(self, err, result);
1122             }
1123           }
1124         });
1125       }
1126     ],
1127 
1128     function (err, result) {
1129       Helpers._emitEvent(self, err, self.EVENT_ERROR, self.EVENT_SCHEMA_DATA_AVAILABLE, result);
1130       if (callback && typeof(callback) === 'function') {
1131         callback.call(self, err, result);
1132       }
1133     }
1134   );
1135 };
1136 
1137 /**
1138  * Read data lob object
1139  * @param lobObject
1140  * @param pos
1141  * @param length
1142  * @param callback
1143  */
1144 CUBRIDConnection.prototype.lobRead = function (lobObject, pos, length, callback) {
1145   var err = null;
1146   var self = this;
1147   var responseData = new Buffer(0);
1148   var expectedResponseLength = this._INVALID_RESPONSE_LENGTH;
1149   var buffer;
1150 
1151   pos--;
1152   if (lobObject.lobLength < pos + length) {
1153     err = new Error(ErrorMessages.ERROR_INVALID_LOB_POSITION);
1154     if (typeof err !== 'undefined' && err !== null) {
1155       Helpers.logError(ErrorMessages.ERROR_ON_CLOSE_QUERY_HANDLE + err);
1156     }
1157     callback.call(null);
1158   }
1159 
1160   var real_read_len;
1161   var read_len;
1162   var total_read_len = 0;
1163 
1164   ActionQueue.while(
1165     function () {
1166       return length > 0;
1167     },
1168 
1169     function (cb) {
1170       read_len = Math.min(length, self._LOB_MAX_IO_LENGTH);
1171       var packetWriter = new PacketWriter();
1172       var lobReadPacket = new LOBReadPacket(
1173         {
1174           casInfo    : self._CASInfo,
1175           db_version : self._DB_ENGINE_VER
1176         }
1177       );
1178       lobReadPacket.write(packetWriter, lobObject, pos, read_len);
1179       self._socket.write(packetWriter._buffer);
1180 
1181       self._socket.on('data', function (data) {
1182         responseData = Helpers._combineData(responseData, data);
1183         if (expectedResponseLength === self._INVALID_RESPONSE_LENGTH &&
1184           responseData.length >= DATA_TYPES.DATA_LENGTH_SIZEOF) {
1185           expectedResponseLength = Helpers._getExpectedResponseLength(responseData);
1186         }
1187         if (responseData.length === expectedResponseLength) {
1188           self._socket.removeAllListeners('data');
1189           var packetReader = new PacketReader();
1190           packetReader.write(data);
1191           real_read_len = lobReadPacket.parse(packetReader);
1192           pos += real_read_len;
1193           length -= real_read_len;
1194           total_read_len += real_read_len;
1195           if (real_read_len === 0) {
1196             length = 0;
1197           }
1198           buffer = lobReadPacket.lobBuffer;
1199           var errorCode = lobReadPacket.errorCode;
1200           var errorMsg = lobReadPacket.errorMsg;
1201           if (errorCode !== 0) {
1202             err = new Error(errorCode + ':' + errorMsg);
1203           }
1204           if (cb && typeof(cb) === 'function') {
1205             cb.call(self, err);
1206           }
1207         }
1208       });
1209     },
1210 
1211     function (err) {
1212       Helpers._emitEvent(self, err, self.EVENT_ERROR, self.EVENT_LOB_READ_COMPLETED, buffer, total_read_len);
1213       if (callback && typeof(callback) === 'function') {
1214         callback.call(self, err, buffer, total_read_len);
1215       }
1216     });
1217 };
1218 
1219 
1220
